caption:
The photograph portrays an urban scene where three people are in motion near a red transit bus labeled "NYC" indicating it's a New York City bus, specifically bus number 1129. This bus displays a destination sign reading "18 X FARAGUT SQRE" on its front, indicating its route.

On the bus, the side door is open and one person, possibly a passenger, is stepping onto the curb, while two other individuals (men) are seen walking next to the bus. Both are dressed in smart casual attire with coats and carrying briefcases, illustrating a likely weekday scenario possibly involving commuters.

The setting appears to be a bus stop located in a moderately built area. In the background, a large building with the text "GRAND UNION" on its fa√ßade suggests a supermarket or shopping plaza nearby, complemented by a parking lot in which several cars are visible, including a red car that stands out.

The scene is enveloped by a somewhat barren landscape with a glimpse of grassy areas, indicating either a transitional season or a less manicured part of the city. The overall atmosphere implies a routine urban life scene with people engaging in daily commuting activities.
title: Catching "pentagon special" in a Virginia suburb
